author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Senior Citizens Group of Besant Nagar (SCGOBN) will be convening a meeting on Monday, February 15, to discuss threats faced by the elderly, especially those living alone and arrive at solutions.

A press note said that instances of land and flat grabbing, targeting the elderly living alone, are beginning to rise in the city. Senior citizens were becoming a soft target for land grabbers, a press release said. To speak about this problem and also to arrive at solutions, the group has organised a meeting at Orange Opticals on 3rd main road in Besant Nagar.

The suggestions will be forwarded to the Chief Minister and the police. Due to space constraints, prior registration is a must. For registration and details call V. Chandrasekhar at 98842 24480
title: Plan to combat land-grabbing threat to elderly
